# PED::SET_HEALTH_SNACKS_CARRIED_BY_ALL_NEW_PEDS

## Summary
Sets the probability and amount of health d

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** probability: Between 0 (peds never drop snacks) and 1 (peds always drop snacks)
* **INT** healthGiven: The amount of health given by each snack

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Related to Peds dropping pickup_health_snack; p0 is a value between [0.0, 1.0] that corresponds to drop rate
